details.name: subject
details.old_value: make all weapons recoil FPS independent and random
details.new_value: Make all weapons recoil FPS independent and random

details.name: description
details.old_value:
Current recoil value is highly FPS independent (specially the 71 FPS value).
Recoil should be made (slightly) random and FPS independent.

Note that some mode removed +lookup, -lookup, +lookdown, and -lookdown commands from the client mod to deal with anti-recoil cheats.

Forum discussion link: http://www.etlegacy.com/boards/3/topics/326
